thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: A Cheap Option on Car Industry Consolidation

author: Stephen Wilmot
title: A Cheap Option on Car Industry Consolidation
text:
Is the French government under Emmanuel Macron any closer to letting go of Renault, France’s biggest car maker? The signals are mixed, but a move might be worth betting on anyway.
There are simply too many car makers in the world. Investors have long seen a full merger between Renault and Japanese car maker Nissan as the lucrative endgame of their 18-year-old “alliance,” which in 2016 was joined by a smaller player, Mitsubishi Motors.
...
